column2: Support Vector Machines with Radial Basis Function Kernel
Tuning parameter 'sigma' was held constant at a value of 449.2951
Accuracy was used to select the optimal model using the largest value.
The final values used for the model were sigma = 449.2951 and C = 2.
results$SampleC <- c(Cytoplasm, Cytoskeleton, `Endoplasmic Reticulum`, Mitochondria, Nucleus, `Plasma membrane`, Postsynapse, Presynapse)
